洣字的基本解释

洣
mǐ
〔洣水〕水名，在中国湖南省，湘江支流。

洣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐ］
［《廣韻》莫禮切，上薺，明。］
水名。在湖南省。发源于酃县南境，西北流到衡东县境，入湘江。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·洣水》。

洣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洣； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页621第06
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】莫禮切【韻會】母禮切，?音米。水名。【水經注】出江州安城郡廣興縣太平山，西北流逕茶陵縣南。

洣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
洣字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Faint
mǐ
〔责水〕The name of the water is a tributary of the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province, China.
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǐ]
["Guangyun" Mo Liqie, top water chestnut, Ming. ]
Water name. In Hunan Province. Originated in the southern border of Zhixian County, flowed to the border of Hengdong County in the northwest, and entered the Xiangjiang River. Refer to Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Shui Jing Zhu · Huan Shui".
Faint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　洣; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 621 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Liqie [Yunhui] Mother Liqie,? Yinmi. Water name. [Shuijing Note] Out of Taiping Mountain, Guangxing County, Ancheng County, Jiangzhou, flows from the northwest to the south of Chaling County.
